column1: The Pit Room////As the line moved and we made it into the restaurant
column2: I took in my surroundings. The wood bench seating
column3: the long table seating near the condiment bar
column4: and then the cafeteria-style food line all made me smile. Then as we got closer to the food
column5: I noticed the DDD logo on the wall. NOW all the stars and reviews made sense!
